title: Calories in Cinnamon Toast Crunch
meta_description: Learn calories in Cinnamon Toast Crunch per serving, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and sodium for quick nutrition tracking.
assumptions: Dry cereal; standard serving of 1 cup (31 g); no milk or toppings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, serving size, and preparation; check box labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One cup of Cinnamon Toast Crunch provides 130 calories and 25 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Cinnamon Toast Crunch?
faqs.a: About 130 calories per 1 cup (31 g) serving.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in Cinnamon Toast Crunch?
faqs.a: 12 g of sugars per 1 cup serving, mostly added sugars.

faqs.q: Does Cinnamon Toast Crunch have protein?
faqs.a: Only 1 g of protein per cup; pair with milk or yogurt for more.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Cinnamon Toast Crunch?
faqs.a: 230 mg per 1 cup serving from the cereal's seasoning.

faqs.q: Calories in Cinnamon Toast Crunch with milk?
faqs.a: Adds 40–75 kcal depending on milk type; total around 170–205 for 1/2 cup skim or whole.
